name: Lyte
description:
Lyte, a short game about torches and ghosts.
This is just a small prototype.
Arrows to move, spacebar to shoot, ESC to close.

Game created for the Fig Game Jam
@Angry Apple - Graphic designer
@Fev - Game designer
@Roby65 - Programmer
